OOC:  I did accept damage for the axe swing.  It hit
Sunhawk's LEFT hand, the headlock was in his RIGHT!

BIC:  Sunhawk transforms halfway there, grabs Kup, and
lifts hi up over the plasma blast.

--- x_rauq_x <x_rauq_x@...> wrote:
> If that's what you like to do, then perhaps you
> should do it, and 
> not otherwise. At the moment, you didn't post for
> dodging Megatron's 
> attack, Sunhawk grabbed Megatron and put him into a
> headlock, and 
> then turned him around to face Kup's weaponfire.
> THAT is what's 
> wrong. You should be posting that Sunhawks tries to
> grab Megatron to 
> put him into a headlock, not that he suddenly has
> him in a headlock. 
> =)
> 
> Cause talking ooc style is delaying Megatron, I'm
> going to just go 
> with that you've done. I'm not sure that Azure wants
> Warhead dead, 
> so Megatron is going to just try to run with
> Warhead. Heh, he's got 
> the whole maximal base running him down right now
> eh. =P
> 
> -- Megatron --
> 
> Megatron's axe swishes harmlessly past Sunhawk's
> side. The over 
> powered swing allows Sunhawk to grapple him, and get
> him into a 
> headlock.
> 
> "Hah, a headlock?!" Megatron gets hit by one of
> Kup's shots, a char 
> mark appears on his back armour, then he grabs for
> Sunhawk's legs, 
> attempting to try to throw him at Kup, along with a
> plasma blast. 
> (he's going to throw Sunhawk and try to hit him with
> a plasma blast 
> after the throw)
> 
>

> wrote:
